18namespace v8 {
19
20class Context;
21class UnboundScript;
22
26class V8_EXPORT Function : public Object {
27 public:
32 static MaybeLocal<Function> New(
33 Local<Context> context, FunctionCallback callback,
34 Local<Value> data = Local<Value>(), int length = 0,
35 ConstructorBehavior behavior = ConstructorBehavior::kAllow,
36 SideEffectType side_effect_type = SideEffectType::kHasSideEffect);
37
38 V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT MaybeLocal<Object> NewInstance(
39 Local<Context> context, int argc, Local<Value> argv[]) const;
40
41 V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT MaybeLocal<Object> NewInstance(
42 Local<Context> context) const {
43 return NewInstance(context, 0, nullptr);
44 }
45
51 V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT MaybeLocal<Object> NewInstanceWithSideEffectType(
52 Local<Context> context, int argc, Local<Value> argv[],
53 SideEffectType side_effect_type = SideEffectType::kHasSideEffect) const;
54
55 V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT MaybeLocal<Value> Call(Local<Context> context,
56 Local<Value> recv, int argc,
57 Local<Value> argv[]);
58
59 void SetName(Local<String> name);
60 Local<Value> GetName() const;
61
68 Local<Value> GetInferredName() const;
69
74 Local<Value> GetDebugName() const;
75
80 int GetScriptLineNumber() const;
85 int GetScriptColumnNumber() const;
86
91 int GetScriptStartPosition() const;
92
96 int ScriptId() const;
97
102 Local<Value> GetBoundFunction() const;
103
110 V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT MaybeLocal<String> FunctionProtoToString(
111 Local<Context> context);
112
119 V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT bool Experimental_IsNopFunction() const;
120
121 ScriptOrigin GetScriptOrigin() const;
122 V8_INLINE static Function* Cast(Value* value) {
123#ifdef V8_ENABLE_CHECKS
124 CheckCast(value);
125#endif
126 return static_cast<Function*>(value);
127 }
128
129 static const int kLineOffsetNotFound;
130
131 private:
132 Function();
133 static void CheckCast(Value* obj);
134};
135} // namespace v8
